attributes.action: Award the contract for the "New" blue Passport to a British company
attributes.additional_details: The contract has not been awarded to De La Rue, a British Passport manufacturing company, but is to be awarded to a French company
attributes.background:
This opportunity should be the first of many steps to restore the British manufacturing industry. We should not be awarding it to a non-British company.
A Passport is the very essence of any country's identity and should be revered as such.
